title: About
body:
# About

Hi, I'm Markus, a web developer from Stockholm.

2010 I completed my master in computer and system science. And since then I have worked with web development. Mainly in Drupal projects.

Web development is one of my biggest interest and hobbies.

More recently I have fallen in love with Vue.js, broman.io is built with nuxt.js and deployed as a static site to Netlify and content is edited through Netlify CMS. test
